description: Relaxed-fitting camp Polo shirt made from slub cotton jersey. Knit with mercerized yarns for a slight sheen. Printed with a horse motif inspired by a vintage garment. Coconut shell buttons. Washed for a broken-in look and feel.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.25" back body length, a 17.75" shoulder, and a 42" chest.
Camp collar. Three-button placket. Coconut shell buttons.
